title: First Day Jitters 2
description: Your first remote meeting. Thankfully, people are forgiving.

dialogues.text: Welcome to the quarterly review meeting.  We have lots to discuss today.
Hey everyone!  I'm super excited to share our Q4 results!
Before we begin, I would like to  emphasize  how important it is to listen carefully.
Let's synergize our efforts and leverage our core competencies going forward. Any questions?
Wojak, are you with us? You look a bit uncomfortable.
HAHAHA,  that's so funny!  I can't believe that happened!
As I was sayingour quarterly numbers are lookingpromising.
I've been working on the blockchain initiative with the marketing team. The results are interesting.
Can we  leverage the AI framework before next week's deadline?  It's urgent!
Everyone  needs to submit their reports by EOD.  Noexceptions!
Sorry about that, I'm coming down with something.  Excuse me.
We should totally pivot with the new SaaS platform going forward! Right team?  Anyone?
Let's wrap this up. Wojak, do you haveanything to add?
That reminds me of last year's company retreat!  So embarrassing!
I think we've covered everything for today.  Great progress everyone!
Thank you all for attending.  Meeting adjourned.
